title: 6 Year old account, Reseted. Why??
body:
Logged in today like normally, and a pop up asked me to change my username. I didnt put much thought into it. Then everythings been reseted! Lvl 1, no champs, no skins.  Its not a different account, its my main one. Had it since 2013. 
    What should i do?

replies.body:
Hey Lone Ranger,

This can happen sometime when someone has multiple accounts, sometime on different regions. It looks like you're posting on the NA account, was your main account always on NA? If it is indeed an NA account--as The 23rd Gamer mentioned--reach out to my colleagues through the Support Site so we can take a further look into it: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Good to see you posting here - hope to see more (although I know you're probably busy, sometimes a Riot explanation is better than anything players could asplain :P)

I would first try waiting for a bit and then logging into your account again to see if your stuff is still gone or not.

If it is still gone, I'd contact [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let them know about your situation, since they are really the only ones that can modify your account any.

Good luck!
